scripts.postinstall: (cd server && npm install) && (cd client && npm install)
scripts.start:dev: DEBUG=start-server-and-test START_SERVER_AND_TEST_INSECURE=1 start-server-and-test start:dev:server http-get://localhost:9100 start:dev:client
scripts.test: (cd server && npm test) && (cd client && npm run test:full)
scripts.test:components: (cd server && npm run test:full) && (cd client && npm run test:full)
scripts.test:full: npm run test:components && npm run test:integration
scripts.deploy:cloud: REACT_APP_SERVER_LOCATION=cloud npm run build && ibmcloud dev deploy
scripts.deploy:local: REACT_APP_SERVER_LOCATION=local npm run build && npm start
scripts.deploy:local-network: REACT_APP_SERVER_LOCATION=local-network npm run build && npm start
